IAIcourse.title: Discover the Introduction to International Application Course
IAIcourse.description: This is the perfect starting point for those looking to begin their journey toward applying for higher education abroad. We cover all the necessary content for a successful application, from choosing the right program and university to writing a compelling motivation letter. Don’t worry if you lack prior experience; the course is designed for students of all knowledge levels. Get ready to take your first steps toward your international academic future!

method.title: Organization and Method
method.description: Learn how to efficiently organize yourself, from selecting universities and important deadlines to creating a structured study schedule, ensuring you’re prepared for every stage of the application process.

exams.title: Standardized Exams
exams.description: Master the skills needed to excel in standardized tests, with a special focus on areas such as the DET and TOEFL, to achieve competitive scores that will stand out in your applications.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Discover the essential documents required by international universities, from academic transcripts and recommendation letters to translation and authentication, ensuring your paperwork is complete and presentable.

first.question: What are the requirements for joining the Van Veen Institute?
first.answer1: Our only limitation is the number of available spots. Other than that, there are no requirements! We are open to all students dreaming of pursuing higher education abroad, regardless of their field of study or level of experience.
first.answer2: If you want to join the Institute but there are no spots available at the moment, don’t worry. Get in touch with us, and we’ll notify you when new spots open up!

second.question: How long is the preparatory program?
second.answer: The duration of the preparatory program varies depending on the chosen course. We offer both short- and long-term options, allowing you to select the one that best fits your schedule and academic needs.

third.question: Do you provide support in choosing a university?
third.answer: Yes! Our international education specialists are ready to provide personalized guidance in selecting the ideal university for you. We consider your academic interests, profile, and career goals to help identify the best options aligned with your aspirations.

fourth.question: What if I need additional support during the application process?
fourth.answer: We are here to assist at every stage of the application process. Beyond the preparatory program, we offer individualized support for resume reviews, essay writing, interview preparation, and guidance on application procedures, ensuring you are well-prepared and confident throughout the process.

history.title: 12 Years Transforming the Lives of Brazilians
history.first: The Van Veen Institute, founded in February 2010 by Nicolas Van Veen, stands out in the educational landscape for its mission to democratize access to international higher education. It offers a humanized, inclusive, and sustainable approach. Based in Brazil, the institute's primary goal is to prepare and guide Brazilian students to join top universities abroad, focusing on securing scholarships and fostering academic and personal development.
history.second: The institution's flagship program is the Van Veen College Programme (VVCP), which integrates classical disciplines such as rhetoric, logic, and grammar with preparation for essential international exams like TOEFL, IELTS, DUOLINGO, SAT, and ACT. VVCP not only prepares students for academic challenges but also provides personalized support throughout the application process, from university selection to essay writing and interviews.
history.third: The Van Veen Institute is deeply committed to social inclusion, offering opportunities for low-income students through strategic partnerships and cultural exchange programs. By 2024, the institute had already helped over 300 students gain admission to international universities and contributed to securing over 200 scholarships, consolidating its relevance in supporting young Brazilian talents.
history.fourth: Beyond its direct impact on students, the institute plays an active role in internationalizing education in Brazil. A notable example is its partnership with the City Hall of Holambra, SP, where it leads the implementation of a plan to integrate the municipality into the global educational scene. This ambitious project includes creating 250 agreements with international universities, enhancing opportunities for local students.
history.fifth: The excellence of the Van Veen Institute is also reinforced by its renowned academic board, composed of researchers and PhD professors with extensive international experience. This team contributes to producing articles, dissertations, and theses, which enhance the institute's relevance in the global education debate.
history.sixth: Another significant milestone is the institute's international recognition as a Member of the Royal Society of History, based in London. This affiliation highlights the depth of its academic work and its connection to the global community of historical and cultural studies.
history.seventh: The Van Veen Institute serves as a bridge not only to international higher education but also to developing a broad and transformative vision of the role of education in building a more equitable and connected future.

first.title: Cultivate peace and good character.

second.title: Help the poor and oppressed.
second.description: We value solidarity and social responsibility, seeking opportunities to assist those most in need.

third.title: Respect your parents.
third.description: We recognize the importance of family bonds and encourage respect and gratitude toward parents and guardians.

fourth.title: Respect differences.
fourth.description: We celebrate diversity and promote an inclusive environment where all individuals are valued and respected.

fifth.title: Respect your teachers.
fifth.description: We emphasize the importance of respecting and valuing teachers, acknowledging their essential contribution to students' learning.

sixth.title: Method and discipline.
sixth.description: We value discipline and a structured study method, which are fundamental to academic progress.

seventh.title: Perseverance.

eighth.title: Be honest.

tenth.title: Always study.

emerge.header: The Van Veen Institute is the official and exclusive representative of Emerge Education in Brazil.

features.title: What Does Emerge Education Offer?
features.paragraphs1: Emerge connects Brazilian students to the best educational institutions in the United States, located in vibrant and renowned regions such as Silicon Valley, New York, Chicago, and Boston. Partner universities offer a wide range of STEM and non-STEM programs for Bachelor’s, Master’s, and Doctorate degrees, meeting the needs of students with different career goals.

first.title: Life-Changing Differentiators
first.content: Emerge is also a pioneer in developing certification and professional training programs focused on the future of work. Through the Workforce Navigator program, companies and individuals gain access to customized and certified training that strengthens their careers and organizations.

second.title: Why Is This Important to You?
second.content: Studying in the United States with the support of the Van Veen Institute and Emerge Education is more than just earning a degree: it’s the first step towards a future full of global opportunities. Our partnership provides the support you need to plan, execute, and achieve your academic and professional goals.

first.title: Exclusive Access to World-Class Programs
first.reason: Whether you aspire to be an engineer, entrepreneur, or scientist, Emerge offers academic programs of excellence to boost your career.

second.title: Personalized Support
second.reason: From the first contact to your arrival in the U.S., the Emerge and Van Veen Institute teams will be by your side to guide you through the selection process, applications, and adaptation.

third.title: Focus on Results
third.reason: More than 4,500 national and international students have achieved their dreams of studying abroad with Emerge's help.

experience.title: Emerge and Its Expertise in Higher Education
experience.paragraph1: Emerge is an American company passionate about higher education. With more than 150 years of combined experience in the sector, the company works with top universities and colleges to provide students with the best learning opportunities. Emerge has the expertise and dedication needed to help students achieve their educational and career goals.

list.title: Emerge’s Unique Approach Sets It Apart:
list.first: Emerge boasts unmatched expertise in leadership, marketing, and recruitment in higher education, with more than 150 years of combined experience within its team. This team of specialists covers all aspects of marketing and recruitment comprehensively.
list.second: The company has built high-performing teams in the areas of marketing, recruitment, and student success support, forming partnerships with leading universities. These collaborations have resulted in thousands of success stories in Bachelor’s, Master’s, and Doctorate programs.
list.third: With a long history of establishing strong relationships with higher education institutions, Emerge brings students the best programs and services. Its deep knowledge of institutional culture, brands, programs, faculty expertise, and competition strengthens its reputation as a reference in higher education in the U.S. and beyond.
list.fourth: Emerge provides access to 17 colleges and universities across the United States, offering a wide range of Bachelor’s, Master’s, and Doctorate programs in various fields of study.
list.fifth: Emerge’s university partnerships are located in some of the most exciting, vibrant, and diverse regions of the United States, ranging from Silicon Valley, California, to Boston, Chicago, and New York, among others.
list.sixth: Since its founding, Emerge has had the privilege of recruiting more than 4,500 national and international students for its partner institutions in the United States.
list.seventh: Emerge has a deep understanding of the international market. The company identifies the fastest-growing educational markets in the world, using proprietary and third-party international market data. Emerge monitors market trends and continuously builds connections with growing populations of global students through its exclusive network of international partners, offering local support, specialized marketing, and personalized guidance.
